Name: Absorb
Description: It damages an enemy, It also restores your HP. The greater the damage it causes, the more HP it restores.

Name: Acid
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Sp.Def.

Name: Acid Armor
Description: It sharply boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Acid Spray
Description: It damages an enemy. It also sharply lowers the enemy's Sp.Def.

Name: Acrobatics
Description: It damages an enemy, If you are not holding an item, the damage goes up.

Name: Acupressure
Description: It sharply boosts the Attack, Defense, Sp.Atk, Sp.Def, evasiveness, accuracy, or Travel Speed of you and your teammates in the same room. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Aerial Ace
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Aeroblast
Description: It damages even faraway Pokemon. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: After You
Description: After switching your position with your teammate, it boosts your teammate's Attack, Defense, Sp.Atk, Sp.Def, accuracy, or evasiveness. The stat returns to normal when the Pokemon goes to the next floor or steps on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Agility
Description: It boosts the Travel Speed of you and your teammates in the same room.

Name: Air Cutter
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Air Slash
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.

Name: Ally Switch
Description: It switches the positions of you and your teammate.

Name: Amnesia
Description: It sharply boosts your Sp.Def. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Ancient Power
Description: It damages and enemy. It could also boost your Attack, Defense, Sp.Atk, Sp.Def. and Travel Speed. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Aqua Jet
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Aqua Ring
Description: You'll get the Aqua Ring condition, which keeps restoring your HP.

Name: Aqua Tail
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Arm Thrust
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Aromatherapy
Description: If you and your teammates in the same room have any bad statuses, all the bad statuses will be removed.

Name: Assist
Description: It causes you to unleash a random move from all the moves known by your teammates on the floor. Some moves can't be used in this way!

Name: Assurance
Description: It damages an enemy. It will cause more damage if the enemy's HP is down to half or lower.

Name: Astonish
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.

Name: Attract
Description: It makes an enemy Infatuated, which makes the enemy's moves more likely to fail.

Name: Aura Sphere
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It never misses.

Name: Aurora Beam
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also sharply lower the target's Attack.

Name: Aurora Veil
Description: It gives you and your teammates in the same room the Aurora Veil condition, reducing damage taken from moves. This move fails when the weather is not Hail.

Name: Autotomize
Description: It sharply boosts your Travel Speed, and you'll get the Autotomize condition, making your whole body feel lighter.

Name: Avalanche
Description: You'll get the Bide status for a little while, and then you'll damage an enemy. The more damage you take while biding, the greater the damage you can cause.

Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Description: It lowers the enemy's Attack. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Barrage
Description: It damages an enemy by throwing a round object in an arc. It damages the enemy 2 to 5 times.

Name: Barrier
Description: It sharply boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Baton Pass
Description: After switching your position with your teammate's, it boosts your teammate's Attack, Defense, Sp.Atk, Sp.Def, accuracy or evasiveness. The stat returns to normal when the Pokemon goes to the next floor or steps on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Beat Up
Description: It warps all your teammates close to the targeted enemy.

Name: Belch
Description: It damages an enemy. It will fail if your Belly is close to empty, so be careful.

Name: Belly Drum
Description: It makes your Belly emptier, but it boosts your Attack to the max! The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Bestow
Description: You give your held item to the Pokemon in front of you. If the Pokemon is already holding and item, you can't give your item to the Pokemon, so be careful!

Name: Bide
Description: You'll get the Bide status for a little while, and then you'll damage an enemy. The more damage you take from enemy Pokemon while biding, the greater the damage you can cause.

Name: Bind
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to be Bound.

Name: Bite
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Blast Burn
Description: It damages enemies in the same room. But it also gives you the Recoil status, which prevents you from doing anything on the next turn.

Name: Blaze Kick
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Blizzard
Description: It damages enemies in the same room. It could also make them Frozen. During Hail, the move never misses.

Name: Block
Description: It causes an enemy to get Stuck.

Name: Body Slam
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Bone Club
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Bone Rush
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Bonemerang
Description: It damages even faraway Pokemon 2 times in a row.

Name: Boomburst
Description: It damages all Pokemon in the same room except for you.

Name: Bounce
Description: You get the Bouncing condition. You soar and then strike your enemy on the next turn. While airborne, you'll evade items and moves. This move could also inflict Paralysis on the enemy.

Name: Brave Bird
Description: It damages an enemy, but you'll receive recoil damage, too.

Name: Brick Break
Description: It damages an enemy. It also shatters the enemy's Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil conditions.

Name: Brine
Description: It damages an enemy. It will cause more damage if the enemy's HP is down to half or lower.

Name: Brutal Swing
Description: It damages nearby enemies.

Name: Bubble
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also lower the target's Travel Speed.

Name: Bubble Beam
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also lower the target's Travel Speed.

Name: Bug Bite
Description: It damages an enemy. If the enemy is carrying any food, you'll eat it.

Name: Bug Buzz
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It could also lower their SP. Def.

Name: Bulk Up
Description: It boosts your Attack and Defense. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile

Name: Bulldoze
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It also lowers their Travel Speed.

Name: Bullet Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Bullet Seed
Description: It fires off a seed at a high speed, damaging a Pokemon, even one far away, 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Burn Up
Description: It damages an enemy. Using this move removes your Fire type. You regain your Fire type when you go to the next floor or faint. It fails if you aren't Fire type.

Name: Calm Mind
Description: It boosts your Sp. Atk and Sp. Def. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Camouflage
Description: It changes you type depending on the scenery of the floor. You'll regain your usual type when you go to the next floor.

Name: Captivate
Description: It sharply lowers the enemy's Sp. Atk.

Name: Charge
Description: You'll get the Charging status, which boosts the power of Electric-type moves used on the next turn. It also boosts your Sp. Def. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Charge Beam
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Charm
Description: It sharply lowers the enemy's Attack.

Name: Chip Away
Description: It damages an enemy. The enemy's stat changes in Defense and evasiveness don't affect this attack , regardless of whether the stats were boosted or reduced.

Name: Circle Throw
Description: It damages an enemy and blows the enemy away in a straight line. It causes more damage if the enemy crashes into a wall or a Pokemon.

Name: Clamp
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the target to be subjected to the Clamp condition.

Name: Clear Smog
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses. It also resets the enemy's Attack, Defense, and all other stats, regardless of whether they were boosted or reduced.

Name: Clear Combat
Description: It damages an enemy but also lowers your Defense and Sp. Def. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Coil
Description: It boosts your aAttack, Defense, and accuracy. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Comet Punch
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Confide
Description: It lowers the enemy's Sp. Atk.

Name: Confuse Ray
Description: It makes an enemy Confused.

Name: Confusion
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Confused.

Name: Constrict
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Travel Speed.

Name: Conversion
Description: It changes your type to the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves you know. You return to your original type when you go to the next floor or faint.

Name: Conversion 2
Description: It changes your type to the type that is advantageous to a target's last move. You return to your original type when you go to the next floor or faint.

Name: Copycat
Description: You counter the enemy by mimicking the enemy's last move. There are some moves that can't be used in this way.

Name: Cosmic Power
Description: It boosts your Defense and SP. Def. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Cotton Guard
Description: It significantly boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Cotton Spore
Description: It reduces the enemy's Travel Speed, but it has no effect on Grass-type Pokemon.

Name: Counter
Description: You'll get the Counter status condition, which enables you to counter when you take damage from a physical move.

Name: Covet
Description: It damages an enemy. You'll also steal an item that the enemy has. If you can't carry any more items, your attempt to steal will fail.

Name: Crabhammer
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Cross Chop
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Cross Poison
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Poisoned. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Crunch
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Defense.

Name: Crush Claw
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Defense.

Name: Curse
Description: It boosts your Attack and Defense., but it lowers your Travel Speed. If this is used by a Ghost-type Pokemon, it makes the enemy Cursed but halves your HP.

Name: Dark Pulse
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It could also make them Flinch.

Name: Dazzling Gleam
Description: It damages nearby enemies.

Name: Defense Curl
Description: It boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Defog
Description: It lowers the evasiveness of enemies in the same room.

Name: Destiny Bond
Description: It causes the Destiny Bond condition. The enemy will sustain the same amount of damage that you take. But be careful, its chance of failing rises if used repeatedly.

Name: Detect
Description: You'll Protect yourself from enemies' moves. But its chance of failure rises if you use it after you've already used a move that blocks enemies' attacks.

Name: Dig
Description: You'll get the Digging condition, doing damage to your enemy on the next turn. While underground, you'll evade items and moves.

Name: Disable
Description: It causes the move the enemy last used to be Sealed, which prevents the Pokemon from using it. The seal will be removed when you go to the next floor.

Name: Disarming Voice
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It never misses.

Name: Discharge
Description: It damages enemies in the same room. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Dive
Description: You'll dive underwater, get the Dive condition, and do damage to an enemy on the next turn. You'll evade items or moves while you're underwater. But Surf and Whirlpool will hit you, so be careful.

Name: Dizzy Punch
Description: It damage an enemy. It could also make the enemy Confused.

Name: Doom Desire
Description: You'll get the Doom Desire condition, which lets you charge power to try a powerful attack on the next turn. This attack will damage all enemies in the same room.

Name: Double HIt
Description: It damages an enemy 2 times in a row.

Name: Double Kick
Description: It damages an enemy 2 times in a row.

Name: Double Slap
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Double Team
Description: It boosts your evasiveness. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Double-Edge
Description: It damages an enemy-but you'll receive recoil damage, too.

Name: Draco Meteor
Description: It damages all enemies in the same room, but it also sharply lowers your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Dragon Ascent
Description: It damages enemies in a wide area in front of you. But it lowers your Defense and Sp. Def. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Dragon Breath
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Dragon Claw
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Dragon Dance
Description: It boosts your Attack and Travel Speed. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Dragon Pulse
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Dragon Rage
Description: It inflicts a set amount of damage on an enemy. The greater your level, the further this move can reach.

Name: Dragon Rush
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.

Name: Dragon Tail
Description: It damages an enemy and blows the enemy away in a straight line. It causes more damage if the enemy crashes into a wall or Pokemon.

Name: Drain Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It also restores your HP. The greater the damage causes, the more HP it restores.

Name: Draining Kiss
Description: It damages an enemy. It also restores your HP. The greater the damage it causes, the more HP it restores.

Name: Dream Eater
Description: It damages a sleeping enemy. It also restores your HP. The greater the damage if causes, the more HP it restores.

Name: Drill Peck
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Drill Run
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Dual Chop
Description: It damages an enemy 2 times in a row.

Name: Dynamic Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It also makes the enemy Confused.

Name: Earth Power
Description: It damages enemies in the same room. It could also lower their Sp. Def.

Name: Earthquake
Description: It damages all Pokemon in the same room except for you. It can also damage Pokemon that are underground while using Dig.

Name: Echoed Voice
Description: It damages enemies. It causes more damage if it's used repeatedly. The power also goes up when you use it after a teammate use it.

Name: Eerie Impulse
Description: It sharply lowers the enemy's Sp. Atk.

Name: Egg Bomb
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Electric Terrain
Description: It changes the floor to the Electric Terrain condition. In this condition, Electric-type moves get more powerful. It also prevents Pokemon from sleeping. It has no effect on Pokemon in the air.

Name: Electro Ball
Description: It damages an enemy. The higher your Speed compared to that of the enemy, the greater the damage caused.

Name: Electroweb
Description: It damages an enemy. It also lowers the enemy's Travel Speed.

Name: Embargo
Description: It puts an Embargo on an enemy, making the enemy unable to use any items.

Name: Ember
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn.

Name: Encore
Description: It demands an Encore from an enemy.

Name: Endeavor
Description: It damages an enemy, cutting the enemy's HP down to equal your HP. If your HP is higher than the enemy's, it has no effect.

Name: Endure
Description: You'll get the Enduring status and hang on with 1 HP even if you take big damage. But its chance of failure rises if you use it after you've already used a move that blocks enemies' attack.

Name: Energy Ball
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also lower the enemy's Sp Def.

Name: Entrainment
Description: It makes the Ability of the Pokemon in front of you the same as yours. The effect wears off when you go to the next floor.

Name: Eruption
Description: It damages nearby enemies. The less HP you have , the less powerful this attack will be

Name: Explosion
Description: You''ll get the Explosion condition, explode when you're attacked, and damage the Pokemon around you.

Name: Extrasensory
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.

Name: Extreme Speed
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Facade
Description: It damages an enemy. The damage it causes goes up if you have a bad status. It also prevents your Attack from being lowered when you use this move while you have a Burn.

Name: Fairy Wind
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Fake Out
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Fake Tears
Description: It sharply lowers the enemy's Sp. Def.

Name: False Swipe
Description: It damages an enemy. If you knock an enemy out with it, they will be more likely to join you on your adventure!

Name: Feather Dance
Description: It sharply lowers the enemy's Attack.

Name: Feint
Description: It breaks through the enemy's Protect, Wide Guard, Quick Guard, or Spiky Shield to damage the enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Feint Attack
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Fell Stinger
Description: It damages an enemy. Using this move to cause an enemy to faint will boost your Attack sharply. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or steps on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Final Gambit
Description: It lowers your HP to 1 and damages an enemy by and amount equal to your reduced HP.

Name: Fire Blast
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn.

Name: Fire Fang
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn or cause it to Flinch.

Name: Fire Pledge
Description: It damages an enemy. If your teammate is in a position from which it can use Grass Pledge, the PP of Grass Pledge will be used, but its power increases, and enemies in the same room as you will get the Sea of Fire condition.

Name: Fire Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn.

Name: Fire Spin
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the Fire Spin condition.

Name: Fissure
Description: The enemy will faint instantly if this attack hits, but it's hard to land this move. It has no effect on Flying-type Pokemon or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability.

Name: Flail
Description: It damages an enemy. The lower your HP is, the greater the damage it causes.

Name: Flame Burst
Description: It even damages a faraway Pokemon. It also damages Pokemon around the target.

Name: Flame Charge
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Travel Speed.

Name: Flame Wheel
Description: wIt damages an enemy. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn.

Name: Flamethrower
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn.

Name: Flare Blitz
Description: It damages an enemy, but you'll receive recoil damage, too. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn.

Name: Flash
Description: It lowers the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Flash Cannon
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Sp. Def.

Name: Flatter
Description: It makes an enemy Confused, while also raising the enemy's Sp. Atk.

Name: Fling
Description: You throw an item in an arc, hitting another Pokemon with it. It causes the same effect as throwing an item at an enemy.

Name: Flower Shield
Description: It boosts the Defense of Grass-type Pokemon among you and your teammates in the same room. The stat returns to normal when affected Pokemon go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Fly
Description: You soar, get the Flying status condition, and then strike your enemy in the next turn. While you're in the air, you won't be hit by items or moves.

Name: Focus Blast
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also lower the enemy's Sp. Def.

Name: Focus Energy
Description: You'll get the Focus Energy condition, which raises your critical-hit rate.

Name: Focus Punch
Description: You'll get the Focus Punch condition, focusing your mind and damaging your enemy during the next turn.

Name: Follow Me
Description: It warps 1 random enemy in the same room to the tile in front of you. then it warps your teammates near you to surround the enemy.

Name: Force Palm
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Foresight
Description: It resets an enemy's boosted evasiveness. If the enemy is Ghost type, it also makes the enemy Exposed, which enables Normal- and Fighting-type moves to hit the enemy.

Name: Foul Play
Description: It damages an enemy. But the damage is determined by the target's Attack stat instead of the user's Attack stat.

Name: Freeze-Dry
Description: It damages an enemy. It's super effective on Water-type Pokemon, too. It could also make the enemy Frozen.

Name: Frenzy Plant
Description: It damages enemies in the same room, but it also gives you the Recoil status, which prevents you from doing anything on the next turn.

Name: Frost Breath
Description: It damages an enemy. It always results in a critical hit.

Name: Frustration
Description: It damages an enemy. The less you have opened up to your team, the more powerful this move will be.

Name: Fury Attack
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Fury Cutter
Description: It damages an enemy. Its power goes up if you use it twice in a row.

Name: Fury Swipes
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Future Sight
Description: You'll get the Future Sight condition and damage an enemy on the next turn.

Name: Gastro Acid
Description: It causes the Gastro Acid status condition, which removes the effect of the enemy's Ability.

Name: Giga Drain
Description: It damages an enemy. It also restores your HP. The greater the damage it causes, the more HP it restores.

Name: Giga Impact
Description: It damages an enemy. But it also gives you the Recoil Status, which prevents you from doing anything on the next turn.

Name: Glare
Description: It inflicts Paralysis on an enemy.

Name: Grass Knot
Description: It damages an enemy. The heavier the enemy, the greater the damage caused by the move.

Name: Grass Pledge
Description: It damages an enemy. If your teammate is in a position from which it can use Water Pledge, the PP of Water Pledge will be used, but its power increases, and enemies in the same room as you will get the Swamp condition.

Name: Grass Whistle
Description: It makes an enemy go to Sleep with the gentle sound of Whistling grass.

Name: Grassy Terrain
Description: It changes the floor to the Grassy Terrain condition, where Grass-type moves become more powerful and HP is naturally restored faster. It also halves the damage from moves such as Earthquake, Bulldoze, and Magnitude. It has no effect on Pokemon in the air.

Name: Gravity
Description: It changes the floor's Gravity, which reduces evasiveness. It also eliminates levitating effects and enables Flying-type Pokemon to be hit with Ground-type moves. Pokemon can't be blown away, and they can't warp or travel in the air.

Name: Growl
Description: It lowers the Attack of enemies in the same room.

Name: Growth
Description: It boosts your Attack and Sp. Atk. During Sunny weather or in Extremely Harsh Sunlight, your stats go up even higher. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Grudge
Description: You'll halve your HP and hold a Grudge! If you're hit by an enemy's move, you'll cut the PP of the attacker's move to 0. The status will go away after a while.

Name: Guard Split
Description: It adds together the Defense of you and the target, and then it splits the total equally. It also splits the total SP. Def equally. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Guard Swap
Description: It switches any changes to your Defense and Sp. Def with the target's. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Guillotine
Description: The enemy will faint if this attack hits, but it's hard to land this move. It has no effect on Ghost-type Pokemon.

Name: Gunk Shot
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away, and could also make the enemy Poisoned.

Name: Gust
Description: It damages an enemy. It can hit an enemy that's in the air from using Fly and the like.

Name: Gyro Ball
Description: It damages an enemy. The slower your Speed compared to your enemy's, the greater the damage caused by the move.

Name: Hail
Description: It changes the floor's weather to Hail. During the Hail, all Pokemon except Ice types keep taking damage.

Name: Hammer Arm
Description: It damages and enemy, but it also lowers your Travel Speed. The stat returns to normal after a while.

Name: Harden
Description: It boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Haze
Description: The room becomes hazy, resetting the stats of all Pokemon in the same room. It resets all stats, whether boosted or reduced.

Name: Head Smash
Description: It damages an enemy, but you'll receive recoil damage, too.

Name: Headbutt
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Heal Bell
Description: If you and your teammates in the same room have any bad statuses, all the bad statuses will be removed.

Name: Heal Block
Description: It gives the Heal Block status to all enemies in the same room, making them unable to restore their HP.

Name: Heal Pulse
Description: It restores a distant Pokemon's HP.

Name: Healing Wish
Description: It restores your teammates' HP and heals their bad statuses. But it also depletes your HP to 1, so be careful.

Name: Heart Stamp
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Heat Wave
Description: It whips up hot winds, damaging enemies in the same room. It could also leave them with a Burn.

Name: Heavy Slam
Description: It damages an enemy. The heavier you are compared to the enemy, the greater the damage caused.

Name: Helping Hand
Description: It boosts the Attack and SP. Atk of your teammates in the same room. Their stats return to normal when they go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Hex
Description: It damages an enemy. The damage goes up if the enemy has a bad status condition.

Name: Hidden Power
Description: It damages an enemy. The move's type changes on each adventure.

Name: High Horsepower
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: High Jump Kick
Description: It damages an enemy. But if it misses, you'll hurt yourself!

Name: Hone Claws
Description: It boosts your Attack and accuracy. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Horn Attack
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Horn Drilll
Description: The enemy will faint if this attack hits, but it's hard to land this move. It has no effect on Ghost-type Pokemon.

Name: Howl
Description: It boosts your Attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Hurricane
Description: It damages an enemy, even if the enemy is in the air from using a move such as Fly. It could also make the enemy Confused. During Rain or Heavy Rain, it never misses. But during Sunny weather or in Extremely Harsh Sunlight, it's hard to land this move.

Name: Hydro Cannon
Description: It even damages faraway Pokemon. It also gives you the Recoil status, which prevents you from doing anything on the next turn.

Name: Hydro Pump
Description: It fires off water with incredible force to damage even faraway Pokemon.

Name: Hyper Beam
Description: It damages Pokemon, even those far away, and causes an explosion that also affects the surroundings. Walls and items on the ground will also disappear. But after you use the move, the Recoil prevents you from doing anything on the next turn.

Name: Hyper Fang
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Hyper Voice
Description: It damages near by enemies.

Name: Hypnosis
Description: It makes an enemy go to Sleep. Using the move again makes the enemy Terrified. But if you or your allies are attacked by this move while you're sleeping, you'll become the enemy's Puppet.

Name: Ice Ball
Description: It damages an enemy up to 5 times or until it misses. The power goes up after you use Defense Curl!

Name: Ice Beam
Description: It fires off a cold beam, damaging a Pokemon, even one far away.

Name: Ice Fang
Description: It damages an enemy. It could make the enemy Frozen or cause it to Flinch.

Name: Ice Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Frozen.

Name: Ice Shard
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Icicle Crash
Description: It damages and enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Icicle Spear
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Icy Wind
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away,. It also lowers the target's Travel Speed.

Name: Imprison
Description: If enemies on the same floor know any moves you also know, they have them Sealed, preventing all enemies from using the moves.

Name: Incinerate
Description: It damages and enemy. iIf the enemy is carrying food, this move burns the food, making it useless.

Name: Inferno
Description: It damages an enemy. It also leaves the enemy with a Burn.

Name: Infestation
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the Infestation condition.

Name: Ingrain
Description: You'll get the Ingrain condition. In the In grain condition, you're unable to move but your HP keeps restoring.

Name: Ion Deluge
Description: It changes the floor to the Ion Deluge condition. In the Ion Deluge condition, Normal-type moves will be Electric type.

Name: Iron Defense
Description: It sharply boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Iron Head
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.

Name: Iron Tail
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Defense.

Name: Jump Kick
Description: It damages an enemy. But if it misses, you'll get hurt.

Name: Karate Chop
Description: It damages an enemy. it has a high critical-hit rate

Name: Kinesis
Description: It lowers the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Knock Off
Description: It damages an enemy. The power goes up if the enemy has an item. It also knocks the enemy's held item to the floor near it.

Name: Laser Focus
Description: You get the Laser Focus condition, making your moves critical hits.

Name: Last Resort
Description: It deals big damage to an enemy. But it won't hit unless you have a move with 0 PP remaining. The more moves you have with 0 PP, the more powerful this move becomes.

Name: Lava Plume
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It could also leave them with a Burn.

Name: Leaf Blade
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Leaf Storm
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away, but it also sharply lowers your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Leaf Tornado
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Leech Life
Description: It damages an enemy. It also restores your HP. The greater the damage it causes, the moreHP it restores.

Name: Leech Seed
Description: It gives an enemy the Leech Seed status condition.

Name: Leer
Description: It lowers the enemy's Defense.

Name: Lick
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Light Screen
Description: You and your teammates in the same room get the Light Screen condition, which reduces the damage taken from special moves.

Name: Liquidation
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the target's Defense.

Name: Lock-On
Description: You'll get theSure Shot status, which makes your attacks and moves hit the enemy without fail.

Name: Lovely Kiss
Description: It makes an enemy go to Sleep. Using the move again makes the enemy Terrified. But if you or your allies are attacked by this move while you're sleeping, you'll become the enemy's Puppet.

Name: Low Kick
Description: It damages an enemy. The heavier the enemy, the greater the damage.

Name: Low Sleep
Description: It damages an enemy. It also lowers the enemy's Travel Speed.

Name: Lucky Chant
Description: You and your teammates in the same room will get the Lucky Chant status condition, which protects you from taking critical hits.

Name: Luster Purge
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It could also lower their SP. Def.

Name: Mach Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Magic Coat
Description: You and your teammates in the same room will get the Magic Coat status, which reflects status moves and the effects of wands back at the attacker. But there are some moves that cannot be reflected, so be careful! The status will go away after a while.

Name: Magic Room
Description: It chages to floor to the Magic Room condition, where nobody can use items. The status returns to normal after a while or if you use this move again.

Name: Magical Leaf
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Magnet Bomb
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Magnet Rise
Description: You'll get the Magnet Rise condition. In the Magnet Rise condition, you won't take damage from Ground-type moves.

Name: Magnetic Flux
Description: It sharply boosts the Defense and Sp. Def of you or Pokemon in your party in the same room with the Plus or Minus Ability. The stats return to normal when affected Pokemon go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Magnitude
Description: It damages all Pokemon in the same room, except for you, including Pokemon underground using Dig. It randomly changes its intensity.

Name: Me First
Description: You use one of the enemy's attacking moves. There are some moves that can't be used in this way.

Name: Mean Lock
Description: It causes an enemy to get Stuck.

Name: Mediate
Description: It boosts your attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Mega Drain
Description: It damages an enemy. It also restores your HP. The greater the damage it causes, the more HP it restores.

Name: Mega Kick
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Mega Punch
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Megahorn
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Memento
Description: It sharply lowers theAttack and Sp. Atk of enemies in the same room, but it drops your HP to 1 and warps you to somewhere else.

Name: Metal Burst
Description: You'll get the Metal Burst condition, which enables you to counter when you take damage from moves.

Name: Metal Claw
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Metal Sound
Description: It sharply lowers the enemy's Sp. Def.

Name: Meteor Mash
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Metronome
Description: You can use a randomly selected move. Some moves aren't available, so be careful!

Name: Milk Drink
Description: It restores the HP of you and your teammates in the same room.

Name: Mimic
Description: You can learn the move that the Pokemon in front of you last used. But there are some moves that you can't mimic, so be careful! You return to normal when you go to the next floor or faint.

Name: Mind Reader
Description: You'll get theSure Shot status, which makes your moves hit the enemy without fail.

Name: Minimize
Description: It sharply boosts your evasiveness. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Miracle Eye
Description: It resets an enemy's boosted evasiveness. If the enemy is Dark type, it also causes the Miracle Eye condition, which will allow Psychic-type moves to hit the enemy.

Name: Mirror Coat
Description: You'll get the Mirror Coat Condition, which enables you to counter when you take damage from a special move.

Name: Mirror Move
Description: You counter the enemy by mimicking its last move. You move fails if there's no move to mimic.

Name: Mirror Shot
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Mist
Description: You and your allies that are in the same room are cloaked in Mist, which prevents all your stats from being lowered. But you're not protected from the effects of your moves that lower your own stats.

Name: Mist Ball
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also lower the enemy's Sp. Atk.

Name: Misty Terrain
Description: It changes the floor to the Misty Terrain condition, reducing the damage caused by Dragon-type moves. It also prevents bad statuses. It has no effect on Pokemon in the air.

Name: Moonblast
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Sp. Atk.

Name: Moonlight
Description: It restores the HP of you and your teammates in the same room. During Sunny weather or in extremely Harsh Sunlight, it restores your HP even more. During Rain, Heavy Rain, Hail, or a Sandstorm, the amount regained goes down.

Name: Morning Sun
Description: It restores the HP of you and your teammates in the same room. During Sunny weather or in eExtremely Harsh Sunlight, it restores your HP even more. During Rain, Heavy Rain, hail, or a Sandstorm, the amount regained goes down.

Name: Mud Bomb
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Mud Shot
Description: IJt damages an enemy. It also lowers the enemy's Travel Speed.

Name: Mud Sport
Description: It changes the entire floor's status to Mud Sport, reducing the power of all Electric-type moves.

Name: Muddy Water
Description: It damages all Pokemon in the same room except for you with muddy water. It could also lower the other Pokemon's accuracy.

Name: Mud-Slap
Description: It damages an enemy. It also lowers the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Mystical Fire
Description: It damages an enemy. It also lowers the enem's Sp. Atk.

Name: Nasty Plot
Description: It sharply boosts your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Natural Gift
Description: It damages an enemy. If you're holding food, such as Berries or seeds, the move's type will change and the power will go up.

Name: Nature Power
Description: Borrowing power from nature, a variety of damaging moves will be used depending on the scenery of the floor.

Name: Needle Arm
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.

Name: Night Shade
Description: The amount of damage done matches your level.

Name: Night Slash
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Nightmare
Description: It causes an enemy to have a Nightmare.

Name: Noble Roar
Description: It lowers the enemy's aAttack and Sp. Atk.

Name: Nuzzle
Description: It damages an enemy. It also causes Paralysis.

Name: Octazooka
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also cause the Blinker condition.

Name: Odor Sleuth
Description: It resets any boosts to evasiveness for all enemies in the same room. It also makes Ghost-type enemies Exposed, which allows Normal- and Fighting-type moves to hit them.

Name: Ominous Wind
Description: It damages enemies in the same room. iIt could also boost your Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Travel Speed. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Origin Pulse
Description: It damages nearby enemies.

Name: Outrage
Description: You go berserk, damaging an enemy 2 to 3 times in a row. After that, you'll get Confused.

Name: Overheat
Description: It damages nearby enemies, but it also sharply lowers your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Pain Split
Description: It adds together the HP of you and the enemy and then shares the total equally between you.

Name: Pay Day
Description: If you defeat an enemy with this move, the enemy will drop money. However, enemies you defeat while you're in a maze won't drop any money.

Name: Payback
Description: You'll get the Counter condition, which enables you to counter when you take damage from physical moves.

Name: Peck
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Perish Song
Description: It gives the Perish Song condition to all enemies on the floor. Pokemon affected by the move will faint 3 turns later.

Name: Petal Blizzard
Description: It damages enemies in the same room by stirring up a petal Blizzard.

Name: Petal Dance
Description: It scatters petals about, damaging an enemy 2 to 3 times in a row. After that, you'll get Confused.

Name: Phantom Force
Description: You'll get the Phantom Force condition, which lets you charge power to try a powerful attack on the next turn. This move breaks through the enemy's Protect, Wide Guard, or Quick Guard to damage the enemy.

Name: Pin Missile
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away, 2 to 3 times in a row.

Name: Play Nice
Description: It lowers the enemy's Attack.

Name: Play Rough
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Attack.

Name: Pluck
Description: It damages an enemy. If the enemy is carrying any food, you'll pluck it from their grasp and eat it!

Name: Poison Fang
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Badly Poisoned.

Name: Poison Gas
Description: It makes an enemy Poisoned.

Name: Poison Jab
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Poisoned.

Name: Poison Powder
Description: It makes an enemy Poisoned. But it has no effect on Grass-type Pokemon.

Name: Poison Sting
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Poisoned.

Name: Poison Tail
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Poisoned. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Pound
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Powder Snow
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Frozen.

Name: Power Gem
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Power Split
Description: It adds together the Attack of you and the target, and then it splits the total equally. It also splits the total Sp. Atk equally. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Power Swap
Description: It switches any changes to your Attack and Sp. Atk with the target's. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Power Trick
Description: It switches any changes of your Attack and Defense. The stat changes return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Power Whip
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Power-Up Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It also boosts your Attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Precipice Blades
Description: It even damages a faraway Pokemon.

Name: Present
Description: You give an enemy a gift of a random amount of damage! But be careful, because sometimes the gift could mistakenly help restore the enemy's HP, too. If you use this move on a teammate, it will always help restore their HP.

Name: Protect
Description: You'll Protect yourself from enemies' moves. But its chance of failure rises if you use it after you've already used a move that blocks enemies' attacks.

Name: Psybeam
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away, with a mysterious beam. It could also make the enemy Confused.

Name: Psych Up
Description: You copy the target's changes in Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, accuracy, and evasiveness. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Psychic
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Sp. Def.

Name: Psycho Boost
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. But it also sharply lowers your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Psycho Cut
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Psycho Shift
Description: It transfers your bad status to a target. Not all bad statuses can be transferred, so be careful.

Name: Psyshock
Description: It damages an enemy. The damage is determined by the enemy's Defense stat.

Name: Psystrike
Description: It damages an enemy. This move is a special attack, but the enemy Defense stat determines damage instead of its Sp. Def stat.

Name: Psywave
Description: It damages an enemy. The higher your level, the greater the damage.

Name: Punishment
Description: It damages an enemy. The more the enemy has powered up with stat changes, the more powerful the move becomes.

Name: Pursuit
Description: It damages an enemy. The damage goes up if the enemy has a bad status.

Name: Quash
Description: It causes an enemy to Flinch.

Name: Quick Attack
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Quick Guard
Description: You and your teammates in the same room will get the Quick Guard condition, which protects you from faraway enemies' moves.

Name: Quiver Dance
Description: It boosts your Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Travel Speed. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Rage
Description: You'll get Enraged, which boosts your Attack everytime you take damage from a move. The boosted Attack returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Rage Powder
Description: You'll be a Decoy and become the enemies' primary target.

Name: Rain Dance
Description: It changes the floor's weather to Rain. The power of Fire-type moves goes down, and the power of Water-type moves goes up.

Name: Rapid Spin
Description: It damages an enemy. It also frees you from being bound and from the Leech Seed status. It destroys any trap in front of you, too.

Name: Razor Leaf
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Razor Shell
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Defense.

Name: Razor Wind
Description: It damages all the enemies that are in the same room as you on the next turn! You'll get the Razor Wind status condition, which lets you charge power to try a powerful move on the next turn. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Recover
Description: It restores your HP.

Name: Recycle
Description: It changes a Plain Seed to a different seed or an Oran Berry.

Name: Reflect
Description: You and your teammates in the same room get the Reflect condition, which reduces the damage taken from physical moves.

Name: Reflect Type
Description: It makes your type the same as that of the Pokemon in front of you. You regain your usual type when you go to the next floor.

Name: Refresh
Description: If you and your teammates in the same room have any bad statuses, all the bad statuses will be removed.

Name: Rest
Description: You'll get the Napping condition. With the Napping condition, you'll fall asleep, awakening later with all your HP restored and bad statuses healed.

Name: Retaliate
Description: It damages an enemy. If you know this move, your Attack goes up sharply when an enemy defeats a teammate. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Return
Description: It damages an enemy. The more you've opened up to your team, the more powerful this move will be.

Name: Revenge
Description: You'll get the Bide status for a little while, and then you'll damage an enemy. The more damage you take while biding, the greater the damage you can cause.

Name: Reversal
Description: It damages an enemy. The lower your HP is, the greater the damage it causes.

Name: Roar
Description: It blows an enemy away in a straight line. If the enemy crashes into any Pokemon or a wall, both Pokemon take damage.

Name: Rock Blast
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Rock Polish
Description: It boosts your Travel Speed sharply!

Name: Rock Slide
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Rock Throw
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Rock Tomb
Description: It damages an enemy. It also lowers the enemy's Travel Speed.

Name: Rock Wrecker
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away, but it also gives you the Recoil status, which prevents you from doing anything on the next turn.

Name: Role Play
Description: It copies the Ability of a Pokemon in front of you. You regain your usual Ability when you go the next floor.

Name: Rolling Kick
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Rollout
Description: It damages an enemy up to 5 times or until it misses. The power goes up after you use Defense Curl!

Name: Roost
Description: It restores your HP. If it's used by a Flying-type Pokemon, that Pokemon also loses its Flying-type designation until the next turn.

Name: Rototiller
Description: It boosts the Attack and Sp. Atk of Grass-type Pokemon among you and your teammates in the same room. It has no effect on Pokemon in the air. The stats return to normal when affected Pokemon go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Round
Description: It damages an enemy. It causes more damage if your teammate in the same room just used the same move.

Name: Sacred Fire
Description: It damages enemies in the same room with. mystical flames. It could also leave enemies with a Burn.

Name: Safeguard
Description: You and your teammates in the same room get the Safeguard condition, which prevents you from having bad statuses.

Name: Sand Attack
Description: It lowers the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Sand Tomb
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the Sand Tomb condition.

Name: Sandstorm
Description: It changes the floor's weather to Sandstorm. Pokemon that can't deal with the weather will keep taking damage.

Name: Scald
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn. It will thaw a Frozen Pokemon.

Name: Scary Face
Description: It reduces the enemy's Travel Speed.

Name: Scratch
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Screech
Description: It sharply lowers the enemy's Defense.

Name: Seed Bomb
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Seismic Toss
Description: You'll throw your teammate or an enemy in front of you at another Pokemon or at a trap.

Name: Self-Destruct
Description: You'll get the Self-Destruct status. When you take damage, it causes an explosion!

Name: Shadow Ball
Description: It damages even a faraway Pokemon. It could also lower the enemy's Sp. Def.

Name: Shadow Claw
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Shadow Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Shadow Sneak
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Sharpen
Description: It boosts your Attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Sheer Cold
Description: The enemy will faint instantly if this attack hits, but it's hard to land this move. It has no effect on Ice-type Pokemon.

Name: Shell Smash
Description: It lowers your Defense and Sp. Def while sharply raising your Attack, Sp. Atk and Travel Speed. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Shock Wave
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It never misses.

Name: Signal Beam
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also make the enemy Confused.

Name: Silver Wind
Description: It damages enemies in the same room. It could also boost your Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Travel Speed. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Sing
Description: It makes an enemy go to Sleep.

Name: Sketch
Description: You can learn the target's last move. But there are some moves that you can't sketch, so be careful!

Name: Skill Swap
Description: It trades your Ability with the Ability of a Pokemon in front of you. You regain your usual Ability when you go to the next floor or faint.

Name: Skull Bash
Description: You'll get the Skull Bash condition, which lets you charge power to try a powerful attack on the next turn. It also boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Sky Attack
Description: You'll get the Sky Attack status, which lets you charge power to try a powerful attack on the next turn. It could also make the enemy Flinch. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Sky Drop
Description: You'll get the Sky Drop condition. You'll lift the enemy into the sky and then drop the enemy during the next turn, causing damage to them. You'll evade items and moves while you're in the air.

Name: Sky Uppercut
Description: It damages an enemy. It can hit an enemy that's in the air from using Fly and the like.

Name: Slack Off
Description: It restore your HP.

Name: Slam
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Slash
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Sleep Powder
Description: It makes nearby enemies go to Sleep. but it has no effect on Grass-type Pokemon.

Name: Sleep Talk
Description: If you're sleeping, a move you know will be used automatically on an enemy near you. But keep in mind that nothing will happen if you use this while you're wide awake.

Name: Sludge
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Poisoned.

Name: Sludge Bomb
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also make the enemy Poisoned.

Name: Sludge Wave
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It could also make them Poisoned.

Name: Smack Down
Description: It damages an enemy. If the enemy is flying, it will be Grounded, which allows Ground-type moves to hit it. This move also hits a Pokemon that's in the air from using a move like Fly.

Name: Smart Strike
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Smelling Salts
Description: It damages an enemy. It causes more damage if the enemy has Paralysis, but it heals the Paralysis.

Name: Smog
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Poisoned.

Name: Smokescreen
Description: It lowers the enemy's accuracy.

Name: Snarl
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It also lowers their Sp. Atk.

Name: Snatch
Description: It gives the Snatch status, which lets you steal the effects of a recovery move or status move used nearby. There are some moves that can't be stolen, so be careful!

Name: Snore
Description: If you're sleeping, it will be used automatically and will damage enemies around you. It could also make them Flinch. Keep in mind that nothing will happen if you use it while you're wide awake.

Name: Soak
Description: It changes the type of the target to Water. The type returns to normal when the Pokemon goes to the next floor or faints.

Name: Soft-Boiled
Description: It restores the HP of you and your teammates in the same room.

Name: Solar Beam
Description: You'll get the Solar Beam condition, which lets you charge power to try a powerful attack on the next turn. During Sunny weather or in Extremely Harsh Sunlight, it charges for an immediate attack on the first turn. But during Rain, Heavy Rain, Hail, or a Sandstorm, the damage will be reduced.

Name: Sonic Boom
Description: It inflicts a set amount of damage on an enemy.

Name: Spark
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Spider Web
Description: It causes an enemy to get Stuck.

Name: Spike Cannon
Description: It fires off sharp spikes, damaging a Pokemon, even one far away, 2 to 5 times in a row.

Name: Spikes
Description: It turns your tile into Spikes that damage enemies that step on them. Spikes that you or your teammates make don't do anything to you or your teammates.

Name: Spiky Shield
Description: You'll get the Spiky Shield status, which protects you from enemies' moves. You counterattack when you're attacked by a contact move. This move's chance of failure rises if you use it after you've already used a move that blocks enemies' attacks.

Name: Spit Up
Description: Only the power stored using the move Stockpile is released once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move's power.

Name: Spite
Description: It sharply lowers the PP of the move last used by the enemy. It fails if the enemy had not used a move or if the enemy's PP is already 0.

Name: Splash
Description: You flop wholeheartedly and jump over an enemy or teammate.

Name: Spore
Description: It scatters spores about, making the enemies in the same room go to Sleep. It has no effect on Grass-type Pokemon.

Name: Spotlight
Description: It makes the target into a Decoy, which will then become the enemies' primary target.

Name: Stealth Rock
Description: It turns your tile into an invisible Stealth Rock trap. A Stealth Rock trap damages enemies that step on it. You and your teammates won't take any damage from it.

Name: Steamroller
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Steel Wing
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Sticky Web
Description: It reduces the enemy's Travel Speed. If the enemy is holding an item, it also makes the enemy's item sticky.

Name: Stockpile
Description: It boosts your Defense and Sp. Def and stores one unit of power. You can stockpile power up to 3 times, but if you try to stockpile any more, the move will fail! The more power you stockpile, the greater the effects of Spit Up and Swallow.

Name: Stomp
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Stomping Tantrum
Description: It damages an enemy. If your previous move failed, its damage is increased.

Name: Stone Edge
Description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.

Name: Stored Power
Description: It damages an enemy. If you're Boosted, this move will be more powerful.

Name: Storm Throw
Description: It damages an enemy. It always results in a critical hit.

Name: Strength
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Sting Shot
Description: It reduces the Travel Speed of a Pokemon, even one far away.

Name: Struggle
Description: When you have no PP left, this move comes out instead. It damages an enemy, but it also damages you.

Name: Struggle Bug
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It also lowers their Sp. Atk.

Name: Stun Spore
Description: It inflicts Paralysis on nearby enemies. But it has no effect on Grass-type Pokemon.

Name: Submission
Description: It damages an enemy-but you'll receive recoil damage, too.

Name: Substitute
Description: You'll create a Substitute if you have more than half your max HP. Every time you use this move, your HP decreases. When you create a Substitute, you won't be targeted by enemies, but you can't use moves or items, and you can't restore your HP naturally.

Name: Sucker Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Sunny Day
Description: It changes the floor's weather to Sunny. The power of Fire-type moves goes up, and the power of Water-type moves goes down.

Name: Super Fang
Description: It damages an enemy by halving its existing HP.

Name: Superpower
Description: It unleashes awesome power, damaging an enemy but also lowering your Attack and Defense due to fatigue. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Supersonic
Description: It makes an enemy Confused.

Name: Surf
Description: It damages all Pokemon in the same room except you. It can hit a Pokemon with the Dive status.

Name: Swagger
Description: It makes an enemy Confused, but it also sharply raises the enemy's Attack.

Name: Swallow
Description: Only the power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

Name: Sweet Kiss
Description: It makes an enemy Confused.

Name: Sweet Scent
Description: It gives off a sweet scent that lowers the evasiveness of all enemies in the same room. It could also make enemies' Bellies emptier.

Name: Swift
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Switcheroo
Description: It swaps your held item with a target's held item. The move succeeds even if either you or the target doesn't have an item.

Name: Swords Dance
Description: It sharply boosts your Attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Synchronoise
Description: It damages nearby enemies. But it won't be effective unless you and the enemy share at least one type. Enemies that you don't share a type with won't be damaged.

Name: Synthesis
Description: It restores your HP. During Sunny weather or in Extremely Harsh Sunlight, it restores your HP even more. During Rain, Heavy Rain, Hail, or a Sandstorm, the amount regained goes down.

Name: Tackle
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Tail Glow
Description: It sharply boosts your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Tail Whip
Description: It lowers the enemy's Defense.

Name: Tailwind
Description: It boosts Travel Speed for you and your teammates in the same room.

Name: Take Down
Description: It damages an enemy-but you'll receive recoil damage, too.

Name: Taunt
Description: It makes an enemy Taunted. The taunted Pokemon can't use status moves. The Pokemon can use attack moves, however.

Name: Tearful Look
Description: It lowers the enemy's Attack and Sp. Atk.

Name: Teeter Dance
Description: It makes all Pokemon in the same room Confused except for you.

Name: Telekinesis
Description: It gives the Telekinesis condition to the Pokemon in front of you. In the Telekinesis condition, the Pokemon can't move and its evasiveness goes down, but it won't take damage from Ground-type moves.

Name: Teleport
Description: It warps you to somewhere else on the floor.

Name: Thief
Description: It damages an enemy. You'll also steal an item that the enemy has. If you can't carry any more items, your attempt to steal will fail.

Name: Thrash
Description: It damages an enemy 2 to 3 times in a row. After that, you'll get Confused.

Name: Throat Chop
Description: It damages an enemy and gives them the Throat Chop condition.

Name: Thunder
Description: It can hit an enemy that's in the air from using a move such as Fly. It could also cause Paralysis. During Rain or Heavy Rain, it never misses. But during Sunny weather or in Extremely Harsh Sunlight. it's hard to land this move.

Name: Thunder Fang
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis or make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Thunder Punch
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Thunder Shock
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Thunder Wave
Description: It inflicts Paralysis on an enemy.

Name: Thunderbolt
Description: It damages nearby enemies. It could also cause Paralysis.

Name: Tickle
Description: It tickles an enemy, making them giggle and lowering their Attack and Defense.

Name: Torment
Description: It has the move the enemy last used Sealed, which prevents the Pokemon from using it. The seal will be removed when the Pokemon goes to the next floor.

Name: Toxic
Description: It makes an enemy Badly Poisoned. It never misses if used by Poison-type Pokemon. It will even hit a Pokemon that's used Dig, Fly, or the like.

Name: Toxic Spikes
Description: It turns your tile into Toxic Spikes, which damage enemies that step on the Toxic Spikes, leaving them Poisoned.

Name: Toxic Thread
Description: It makes a faraway Pokemon Poisoned and reduces their Travel Speed.

Name: Transform
Description: It makes your appearance the same as a target's Pokemon. Your moves and types will also change to those of the target Pokemon. If an enemy uses this move, your teammates may become Confused, so be careful! The stat change returns to normal when you go to the next floor.

Name: Tri Attack
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause Paralysis, cause a Burn, or make the enemy Frozen.

Name: Trick
Description: It swaps your held item with a target's held item. The move succeeds even if either you or the target doesn't have an item.

Name: Trick Room
Description: It changes the floor to the Trick Room condition. Travel Speed will be reversed.

Name: Triple Kick
Description: It damages the enemy 3 times in a row.

Name: Trump Card
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses. The lower the PP of the move, the greater the damage it causes.

Name: Twineedle
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away, 2 times in a row. It could also make the enemy Poisoned.

Name: Twister
Description: It damages an enemy. It can hit an enemy that's in the air from using a move such as Fly. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.

Name: Uproar
Description: It damages enemies in the same room. It also causes all Pokemon in the same room to be Sleepless. Sleeping Pokemon will wake up immediately.

Name: U-turn
Description: It damages an enemy. If one of your teammates is right behind you, it switches you and your teammate's positions.

Name: Vacuum Wave
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Venom Drench
Description: It lowers the enemy's Attack, Sp. Atk, and Travel Speed. It will fail unless the enemy is already Poisoned or Badly Poisoned, so be careful!

Name: Venoshock
Description: It damages an enemy. Its power goes up if the enemy is Poisoned or Badly Poisoned.

Name: Vine Whip
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Vise Grip
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Vital Throw
Description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.

Name: Volt Switch
Description: It damages an enemy. If one of your teammates is right behind you, this move switches the positions of you and your teammate.

Name: Volt Tackle
Description: It damages an enemy, but you'll take recoil damage, too. It reaches up to 2 tiles away. It could also inflict Paralysis on the enemy.

Name: Wake-Up Slap
Description: It damages an enemy. It causes more damage if the enemy is in the Sleep, Nightmare, or Napping condition, but it will wake the enemy up.

Name: Water Gun
Description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.

Name: Water Pledge
Description: It damages an enemy. If your teammate is in a position from which it can use Fire Pledge, the PP of Fire Pledge will be used, but its power increases, and your teammates in the same room as you will get the Rainbow condition.

Name: Water Pulse
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also make the enemy Confused.

Name: Water Sport
Description: It changes the entire floor to the Water Sport condition. Damage cause by Fire-type moves goes down.

Name: Water Spout
Description: It damages nearby enemies. The less HP you have, the less powerful this attack will be.

Name: Waterfall
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.

Name: Weather Ball
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. The move's type varies, depending on the weather. The power goes up in any weather condition other than Clear.

Name: Whirlpool
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the Whirlpool condition. It can hit a Pokemon in the Dive state.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: It blows an enemy away in a straight line. If the enemy crashes into any Pokemon or a wall, both Pokemon take damage.

Name: Wide Guard
Description: You and your teammates in the same room will get the Wide Guard condition, which protects you from wide-ranging moves.

Name: Wild Charge
Description: It damages an enemy, but you'll receive recoil damage, too.

Name: Will-O-Wisp
Description: It leaves an enemy with a Burn.

Name: Wing Attack
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Wish
Description: You'll make a Wish! When your Wish comes true on the next turn, your HP and your nearby teammates' HP will be restored.

Name: Withdraw
Description: It boosts your Defense. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Wonder Room
Description: It changes the floor to the Wonder Room condition. Defense and Sp. Def will be swapped. The status returns to normal after a while or after you use this move again.

Name: Wood Hammer
Description: It damages an enemy, but you'll receive recoil damage, too.

Name: Work Up
Description: It boosts your Attack and Sp. Atk. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.

Name: Worry Seed
Description: It changes the target's Ability to Insomnia. The effect wears off when you go to the next floor.

Name: Wrap
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to be Bound.

Name: Wring Out
Description: It damages an enemy. The more HP the enemy has, the greater the damage caused by the move.

Name: X-Scissor
Description: It damages an enemy.

Name: Yawn
Description: It inflicts the Yawning status on an enemy. It will make the target go to Sleep after a while.

Name: Zap Cannon
Description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It also causes Paralysis.

Name: Zen Headbutt
Description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.
